meanings.definition: To make a harsh, high-pitched sound
meanings.sent1: The old door screaks when it opens.
meanings.sent2: The rusty swing set screaks as the children play.
meanings.sent3: The mouse screaks loudly as it scurries across the floor.
meanings.sent4: The hinges of the gate screak like a chorus of tiny birds.
meanings.sent5: The wind screaks through the branches, creating an eerie melody.

meanings.sent1: The screaks of the rusty swing set filled the park.
meanings.sent2: The sudden screaks in the night startled the campers.
meanings.sent3: The screaks of the old violin made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The screaks of the brakes echoed through the tunnel.
meanings.sent5: The screaks of the bats added to the spooky atmosphere of the cave.
